text: is a village located in Okhotsk Subprefecture, Hokkaido, Japan. As of September 2016, the village has an estimated population of 1,120. The total area is 308.12 km². ==Notable people from Nishiokoppe== *Hagurohana Toji, former sumo wrestler ==External links== * *Official Website Category:Villages in Hokkaido
title: Nishiokoppe, Hokkaido
